document.full_text: tennis hall of famer pauline betz addie, who won wimbledon in 1946 without dropping a set, died on tuesday. she was 91.
document.title: tennis great pauline betz addie dies at 91
lines_and_colors: tennis hall of famer pauline betz addie, who won wimbledon in 1946 without dropping a set, died on tuesday. she was 91.
